document_data.name: ''Black Raptor Staff''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Black raptor staff''''' was an [[enchanted]] [[druid]]ic [[staff]] found in the jungles of [[Chult]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Powers: ''Black raptor staves'' were carved out of dark and solid [[suth]] wood and decorated with [[gemstone]]s and [[raptor]] talons. The staves possessed a potent ''+3'' enchantment and strengthened the druid abilities of the wielder as well as the druid's allies.
document_data.Notable Owners: * [[Qawasha]], a druid of the [[Emerald Enclave]] from [[Chult]] in the late 15{{th}} century DR.
